snippet: Yeshiva University last weekend hosted the National Bible Contest, which tests students’ knowledge of stories from the Hebrew Bible.
abstract: Mork Oppenheimer Beliefs column; Yeshiva University hosts National Bible Contest, testing students’ knowledge of stories from the Hebrew Bible; 14-year-old Shalhevet Schwartz from the Bronx wins her division and will compete at the international finals in Jerusalem.
lead_paragraph: Yeshiva University last weekend hosted the National Bible Contest, which tests students’ knowledge of stories from the Hebrew Bible.

headline.print_headline: Bronx Teenager Knows Her Torah Trivia
headline.seo: Beliefs: Bronx Teenager Knows Her Torah Trivia
headline.main: Bronx Teenager Knows Her Torah Trivia
